Package edu.ntnu.idatt1002.group12.flus.view.controllers

Class BaseController

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt1002.group12.flus.view.controllers.BaseController
All Implemented Interfaces:
AssignableController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddBudgetController, AddExpenseController, AddGoalController, AddIncomeController, ChangeEmailController, ChangePasswordController, ChangePhoneNumberController, CheckInExpenseController, CheckInIncomeController, DeleteBudgetController, HomeController, ListBudgetsController, ShowBudgetController, ShowProfileController
public abstract class BaseController extends Object implements AssignableController
The BaseController class is an abstract class which provides the basic functionality that all controllers in the application will have.
Since:
April 24, 2023.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Markus Evald Dalbakk

    • alertException

      protected void alertException(Level levelType, javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType type, Exception exception)
      The method logs an exception with the given level and shows an alert message for the exception.
      Parameters:
      levelType - The logging level to use for the exception.
      type - The type of alert to show.
      exception - The exception to log and show in the alert message.

      Parameters:
      type - The message to display in the alert.
      message - The message to display in the alert.
